channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8314909] tools/jpackage/windows/Win8282351Test.java fails with java.lang.AssertionError: Expected [0]. Actual [1618]:

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/1225
Date: 2024-12-12 11:44:41 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/3110
Date: 2024-12-12 11:44:48 +0000

Fix request [17u,21u]

I backport this to reduce eventual test failures on win.
No risk, only a test change
Clean backport.
Testing pointless. SAP nightly testing passed.

Changeset: 1b104b63
Author: Alexey Semenyuk <asemenyuk@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-09-18 20:12:38 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/1b104b63a97ec947b34b85658153ab6c182cb56c

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/15766
Date: 2023-09-15 15:40:25 +0000

java.lang.AssertionError: Expected [0]. Actual [1618]: Check command [cmd /c .\\test\\unpacked-msi\\unpack.bat](3) exited with 0 code

MSI exit code 1618 indicates there is another msi session running. Probably a system update on the server where the test was being executed.
